trans-unit.source: The base class for discoverable references using XML Web services discovery.

<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> all inherit from <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference>, and represent the three types of documents discoverable through XML Web services discovery: Service Descriptions, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and discovery documents, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference><xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>, 및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> 모두에서 상속 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference>, 세 가지 유형의 XML Web services 검색을 통해 검색 가능한 문서를 나타내고: 서비스 설명, XML XSD (스키마 정의) 스키마 및 검색 문서 각각.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference" /> class.
Gets or sets the instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" /> used in a discovery process.
An instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" /> used in a discovery process
Gets the name of the default file to use when saving the referenced discovery document, XSD schema, or Service Description.
Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: 참조 되는 문서를 저장할 때 사용할 기본 파일의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The URL on which the name of the file is based.
Returns a file name based on the passed URL.
Name of the file based on the passed URL.
<see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the reference document.
Reads the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and returns an instance of the class representing the type of referenced document.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> with an underlying type matching the type of referenced document.
The return value is always an <xref:System.Object>.
However, the underlying type varies, depending on the type of document referenced.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 기본 형식이 참조 되는 문서의 유형에 따라 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: For instance, a <xref:System.IO.Stream> passed into <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.ReadDocument%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 한 <xref:System.IO.Stream> 로 전달 된 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.ReadDocument%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 의 인스턴스를 반환 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Resolves whether the referenced document is valid.
Downloads the referenced document at <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Url" /> to resolve whether the referenced document is valid.
Downloads the referenced document and then invokes the overloaded <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Resolve%2A> member that takes a MIME type and a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 참조 되는 문서를 다운로드 하 고 다음 오버 로드 된 호출 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Resolve%2A> MIME 형식을 사용 하는 멤버와 <xref:System.IO.Stream>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the MIME type and the contents of `stream` match those expected by the reference type, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 경우의 내용과 MIME 형식을 `stream` 필요한 참조 형식이 다음의 내용을 인수와 일치 `stream` 에 추가 되는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> 및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> 의 속성 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
The MIME type of <c>stream</c>.
The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the referenced document.
Resolves whether the referenced document is valid.

If the MIME type and the contents of `stream` match those expected by the reference type, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 경우의 내용과 MIME 형식을 `stream` 필요한 참조 형식이 다음의 내용을 인수와 일치 `stream` 에 추가 되는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> 및 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> 의 속성 <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the referenced document.
The URL of the referenced document.
The document to write into a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> into which the <c>document</c> is written.
When overridden in a derived class, writes the document to a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
DiscoveryReference#1
